snippet.title: Tokyo 24 Ku Inoru Trailer (Launch) | Switch, PC
snippet.description:
SUBSCRIBE for new game trailers daily! 👉 http://bit.ly/mustachegamer

Tokyo 24-Ku: Inoru is a boys love visual novel video game developed by HolicWorks and published by dramatic create.

About

The protagonist, Akihirio Sonogi, is a second-term member of the House of Representatives elected in Kyoto who belongs to the Centrist Democratic Party.

With his good looks and youth, he was able to garner enough votes to help the ruling party gain the majority in the House of Councilors.

Meanwhile, a few days before the Golden Week holidays, a massive car explosion occurred at Shibuya’s scramble crossing.

Judging by the circumstances, the Japanese government under Prime Minister Hayato Sanjou determined it to be a terrorist attack and established a terrorism task force.

With the IAF (International Athlete Festival) scheduled to be held in August 2020, the government was forced to take immediate action against further terrorist attacks, while knowing neither the culprit or motive behind the bombing.

And with this incident, Sonogi also made his move…

#Tokyo24KuInoru #VisualNovel #Tokyo24KuInoruSwitch

⭐ The most anticipates games coming out in 2021: https://youtu.be/Ju3oIIqAv6Y
